title: Bowman AFK (lvl90)
comment_one:
Priority is "Idle Shooting" > "Fist of Rage" > "Featherweight" then dmg talents.
*1 = As much as needed.
comment_two:
Prioritise "Strafe", then "Piercing Arrow" and "Kung fu kick" up to ~50 points in each before going for "High polymer limbs" and "Veins of the Infernal"
*1= As much as needed for 130% movement speed with 5-15 points in "Featherweight".
comment_three: Max "Homing Arrows" and "Magic Shortbow", excess points can go towards maxing "SpeeDna"
notes:
Active Skills directly increase AFK damage (multiplicative). The damage cap for a zone is the Monsterâ€™s HP. AFK damage increases above this cap will not increase your gains. AFK Damage = Minimum damage * Active Skill AFK multiplier
Min Damage to cap Sand Giants with these active skills: 2600
